Restaurant De Air

We take inspiration from the World's best cuisines, and create a unique fusion experience. Our lipsmacking creations will tickle your culinary senses!

Air Pizza HOT $4.99

A unique combination of Pakistani Paratha (pancake) and Italian pizza, topped with Cerignola olives, ripe vine cherry tomatoes, onion, chillies and Buffalo Paneer.
